# File lib/midilib/io/seqreader.rb, line 72
    def note_on(chan, note, vel)
        if vel == 0
            note_off(chan, note, 64)
            return
        end

        on = NoteOnEvent.new(chan, note, vel, @curr_ticks)
        @track.events << on
        @pending << on
        track_uses_channel(chan)
    end
